subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] Re: I'd like to be able to write the prefixes com- and con- as contractions
msgSnippet: ... Except in knish. ;-) Michael Everson * http://www.evertype.com/
messageBody:
On 19 Aug 2011, at 12:45, BPJ wrote:

> In those cases you can safely write KN- (with reverse N) and KM-, since those can not occur word- initially in English (K is mute where they occur in TO).

Except in knish. ;-)

Michael Everson * http://www.evertype.com/
